Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi

Interface ServerConnectionRMIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerConnectionRMI
public interface ServerConnectionRMIInterface extends Remote
Interface representing the rmi server connection on the client-side. It allows the client to perform requests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    beep(Beep beep)
    Sends a beep to server (used as a heartbeat).
    void
    createGame(GameInitialization message)
    Creates a new game according to the parameters specified by the client.
    void
    insertInBookshelf(BookshelfInsertion message)
    Inserts the previously selected items (from the living room) into the client's bookshelf in specified column and order.
    void
    login(Nickname message)
    Performs the login of the client in the server, i.e. their nickname is set.
    void
    selectFromLivingRoom(LivingRoomSelection message)
    Selects the tiles at the positions requested by the client.
    void
    selectGame(GameSelection message)
    Selects an already created game to join.
    void
    writeChat(ChatMessage message)
    Sends a chat message (either broadcast or unicast).

  • Method Details

    • login

      void login(Nickname message) throws RemoteException
      Performs the login of the client in the server, i.e. their nickname is set.
      Parameters:
      message - The request from the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Rmi exception.
